mapper.insert: INSERT INTO o_cart ( uid, gid, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{gid}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT cid, uid, gid, title, price, image, o_cart.num FROM o_cart LEFT JOIN o_goods ON o_cart.gid=o_goods.id WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY o_cart.created_time DESC
SELECT cid, num FROM o_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND gid=#{gid}
mapper.update: UPDATE o_cart SET num=#{num}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE cid=#{cid}
